thread.title: What Dystopian Movie Universe Do You Belong In
thread.title_full: What Dystopian Movie Universe Do You Belong In

author: Keely Flaherty Buzzfeed News Reporter
title: What Dystopian Movie Universe Do You Belong In
text:
What Dystopian Movie Universe Do You Belong In? You got: “Mad Max” Dystopia 
Sand, guzzolene, and problematic dudes everywhere. Warner Bros. You got: “The Hunger Games” Dystopia 
Whatever district you’re from, no one can escape the revolution. Lionsgate You got: “Serenity” Dystopia 
Alliance or Browncoat, we’re all just folks now. Find a crew, find a job, keep flying. Universal You got: “The Matrix” Dystopia 
Dismantle the system from within — even if you’re currently a part of it. Warner Bros. You got: “Minority Report” Dystopia 
Remember that the future is never a sure thing, and avoid sick sticks at all costs. 20th Century Fox 
Break the mold — and remember, becoming fearless isn’t the point. Summit Entertainment
